entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the morning. High 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
